ygData.subject: Re: [EQCheats] Digest Number 240
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Try rubbing a rabbit s foot on the screen, or making a blood sacrifice to the Norns. -- -- Secrets of the Sentient Did You Know: George Washington Never
ygData.messageBody:
--- EQCheats@yahoogroups.com wrote:
> Would anyone happen to know anything about making it possible to
> have /random 1 1000 on Everquest being able to have a better chance
> of making the rolls become higher? Please let me know if you have
> any information on this subject or know of any Web Sites that talk
> about this subject.

Try rubbing a rabbit's foot on the screen, or making a blood sacrifice to the
Norns.

--
--
Secrets of the Sentient
Did You Know:
George Washington Never won a single battle during the revolutionary war.
He only fought delaying actions for better generals, or lost battles.

=====
The more morals and taboos there are, The more cruelty afflicts people;
The more swords and knives there are, The more factions divide people;
The more arts and skills there are, The more change obsoletes people;
The more laws and taxes there are, The more theft corrupts people.

Yet take no action, and the people nurture each other;
Make no laws, and the people deal fairly with each other;
Own no interest, and the people cooperate with each other;
Express no desire, and the people harmonize with each other.
-- Tao Te Ching
